diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Human Rights.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    HumanRights[Human Rights] --> Field1[Law]
    HumanRights --> Field2[Politics]
    HumanRights --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    law --> lawSub1[Theory]
    law --> lawSub2[Practice]
    politics --> politicsSub1[Theory]
    politics --> politicsSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
